version_description:
***IMPORTANT: PLEASE UPDATE TO ENSURE YOU CAN RECEIVE NEW CONTENT****

This update also includes under the hood performance enhancements to ensure you have the best possible user experience.

We’d love for you to rate our app on the App Store as it’s great to read your reviews - However we can’t respond there, so if you have any problems please don’t hesitate to contact us via the app, directly at apps@futurenet.com or you can visit our help page: www.futureplc.com/app-support

Happy Reading!

This update includes behind the scenes improvements to our app storefront. A clearer indication of how to start a FREE trial along with tweaked aesthetic changes has been introduced to help navigation and the overall experience.

Plus:
• Improvements to your 'Library’
• New inbox to deliver you tailored content
• Performance enhancements
• Bug fixes

We’d love for you to rate our app on the App Store as it’s great to read your reviews - However we can’t respond there, so if you have any problems please don’t hesitate to contact us via the app, directly at apps@futurenet.com or you can visit our help page: www.futureplc.com/app-support

Happy Reading!

This update includes behind the scenes improvements to our app stability and stamps out some pesky bugs.

Don't forget to take advantage of our no obligation 30-day trial. You'll get our latest issue absolutely FREE!

If you have any problems please don’t hesitate to contact us via the app, directly at apps@futurenet.com or you can visit our help page: www.futureplc.com/app-support

Happy Reading!

This update includes new iOS 7 aesthetics and improved app stability.

Don't forget to take advantage of our no obligation 30-day trial. You'll get our latest issue absolutely FREE!

If you have any problems please don’t hesitate to contact us via the app, directly at apps@futurenet.com or you can visit our help page: www.futureplc.com/app-support

Happy Reading!

Improvements made to app stability, navigation and translations.

> Don't forget all new subscribers can get our latest issue absolutely FREE with our no obligation 30-day trial

If you have any problems please get in touch via the app, directly at apps@futurenet.com or visit our help page: www.futureplc.com/app-support

We bring you bug fixes, behind the scenes improvements and some new features:

Buy All - iPhone users and those without a subscription can now purchase all unowned back issues for a special discounted price, simply tap the new buy-all button in the library tab

Auto Archive - products over 3 months old can now be archived from your library automatically, this is enabled from the library tab

Cancel Downloads - you can now cancel downloads that are in progress or in a queue

Plus don't forget all new subscribers can get our latest issue absolutely FREE with our no obligation trial!
New app icon for iOS 9 display

We realised that the library area of the app could sometimes be a bit muddled when looking for a particular issue to read, so we have sorted this out into a logical order at all times.

You can now also complete your collection of back issues from the main store and take advantage of huge savings when you buy the entire collection.

And of course we continue to stamp out pesky bugs and improve your reading experience.

We realised that the library area of the app could sometimes be a bit muddled when looking for a particular issue to read, so we have sorted this out into a logical order at all times.

You can now also complete your collection of back issues from the main store and take advantage of huge savings when you buy the entire collection.

And of course we continue to stamp out pesky bugs and improve your reading experience.

You can now download preview samples of our new issues

We’ve updated the Discover section. Check it out to find other magazines we think you’ll enjoy

There’s a new Library sorting toggle so you can organise your downloaded issues

Don’t forget that new subscribers can get our latest issue FREE when they take a 30-day free trial.

Improved Store page loading to help with slow internet and older devices.

Minor bug fixes and optimisations to improve overall app performance.

Don’t forget that new subscribers can get the latest issue FREE with our introductory trial subscription offer!

Minor UI improvements.

Minor bug fixes and optimisations to improve overall app performance.

Don’t forget that new subscribers can get the latest issue FREE with our introductory trial subscription offer!

• Bookmarking bug fix. Some users have reported saving bookmarks are not being stored. If the update doesn't address the problem please get in touch.
• Other minor tweaks to improve the app.

Don’t forget that new subscribers can get the latest issue FREE with our introductory trial subscription offer!

• We've rebranded the app with our new logo and updated the messaging system.
• Bookmarking bug fix. Some users reported that bookmarks were flickering which has now been fixed.
• We've got the feather duster out, squashed some bugs and added support for newer devices.
General app improvements and bug fixes.
